event_name: MillionX Bangladesh - AI & The Future of Bangladesh
description:
Theme: “Creating a Million 10X AI Minds”

Dates: January 16, 2026

Venue: Daffodil Plaza, 4/2 Sobhanbagh, Dhaka

Format: Hybrid (in-person + live streamed)

Organizers: MillionX Bangladesh in partnership with Daffodil Group, BASIS, BASIS Students Forum, universities, and industry partners.

Event Purpose

The MillionX Bangladesh National AI Build-a-thon is a landmark platform to:

  • Empower young innovators to build real, deployable AI solutions.

  • Highlight the Top 20 teams from a pipeline of 5,000+ participants.

  • Bridge universities, government, industry, and investors.

  • Select the Top 5 Young AI Founders for funding, incubation, and global growth.

  • Advance Bangladesh toward a 10X AI Nation by 2030.
